body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Jane Harper Hart in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on November 13, 1825. Father of Benjamin F. Hart, John F. Hart, and Lucretia Hart. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1850. Owned at least two enslaved persons, including James, in Montgomery County in 1855. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860.
